thread.title: The Cold Frontier: Where North Koreans dream of gold

title: The Cold Frontier: Where North Koreans dream of gold
text:
The Cold Frontier: Where North Koreans dream of gold 11:07am BST - 02:04 
On the cold frontier between China and North Korea, people in thin, head-to-toe rubber suits were diving in the river. Locals said they were part of North Korea's smuggling operations, diving for gold in the frozen Yalu river.
